log: - Harvesting resources works correctly again (and works on a separate thread!).
- Added generates an error file if the game crashed from a user json file problem.
- Started converting to new UI system.
- Added multiple noise levels.... maybe? Crap I think I forgot to do something. Okay I just fixed it, we're good! There's a possibility you might spawn in water... a LOT of water...
- Fixed something weird with the noise seed generation. Now it actually varies!
- Added early version of mousing over terrain for information (check bottom right of screen).
